product_name: Patagonia Tribbles Reversible Bunting - Infant Boys' - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Furry or slick? The Patagonia Tribbles Reversible bunting gives you both choices! It offers light, warm protection for infant boys' winter adventures. Reversible design sports a protective recycled polyester shell on one side and cuddly soft fleece on the other; compressible polyester insulation provides comfort and warmth. Shell fabric is treated with Durable Water Repellent for added protection from rain and snow. The Patagonia Tribbles Reversible bunting has a long zipper for easy on and offs. 3-panel hood is snug on baby, elasticized cuffs keep sleeves in place, shell side has convertible hand covers. 100% recyclable through Patagonia's Common Threads Recycling Program-simply return your worn-out item to Patagonia. Closeout.
short_description: Furry or slick? The Patagonia Tribbles Reversible bunting gives you both choices! It offers light, warm protection for infant boys' winter adventures.
